Edges-Leadership -- Male Human Medieval Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Skills (25 Points):
Climbing: (str) d4 Knowledge (Battle): (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Knowledge (Language (Dwarf)): (sma) d8 Survival: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d10 Knowledge (Language (Rakashan)): (sma) d4 Swimming: (agi) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d8 Weird Science: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Charisma: -3 Persuasion/-3 Streetwise
Habit: -1 Charisma
Ugly: -2 Charisma
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 4; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (3 points): Command Presence; Command; Fervor; Hold The Line!; Inspire; Leader Of Men; Natural Leader; Tactician Hindrances: Enemy; Habit; Quirk; Ugly Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Command Presence: Increased Command effects
Inspire: Increased Command effects
Command: R10" Commanded +2 to recover from Shaken
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion
Natural Leader: R10" Share bennies with commanded
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 7 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Axe (d8+d6); Great Axe (d8+d8); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Great Axe Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d8
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Fervor: R10" Commanded gain +1 Fighting damage
Great Axe Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Hold The Line!: R10" Commanded gain +1 Toughness
Leader Of Men: R10" Commanded use d10 wild die
Tactician: R10" Roll Knowledge (Battle), distribute 1 Action Card to commanded for each success and raise
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 3 available vs. 8 allocated
